mapper.insert: insert into alarm_rule ( id, `type`, `name`, is_filter_system, is_filter_position, is_filter_device, is_filter_alarm, is_enable, created_at, created_by ) values ( null, #{type}, #{name}, #{systemId}, #{positionId}, #{deviceId}, #{alarmId}, #{isEnable}, NOW(), #{userId} ); select @@IDENTITY as id;
insert into filter_system ( id, rule_id, system_id ) values ( null, #{ruleId}, #{systemId} )
insert into filter_position ( id, rule_id, position_id ) values ( null, #{ruleId}, #{positionId} )
insert into filter_device ( id, rule_id, device_id ) values ( null, #{ruleId}, #{deviceId} )
insert into filter_alarm ( id, rule_id, alarm_code_id ) values ( null, #{ruleId}, #{alarmId} )
mapper.update: update alarm_rule set `type` = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.type}, `name` = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.name}, is_filter_system = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.systemId}, is_filter_position = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.positionId}, is_filter_device = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.deviceId}, is_filter_alarm = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.alarmId}, is_enable = #{alarmRuleReqDTO.isEnable}, updated_at = NOW(), updated_by = #{userId} WHERE id= #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE filter_alarm,filter_device,filter_position,filter_system FROM filter_alarm,filter_device,filter_position,filter_system,alarm_rule WHERE alarm_rule.id = filter_alarm.rule_id and alarm_rule.id = filter_device.rule_id and alarm_rule.id = filter_position.rule_id and alarm_rule.id = filter_system.rule_id and alarm_rule.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, `type`, `name`, is_enable, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, "%Y-%m-%d %T") as createdAt, DATE_FORMAT(updated_at, "%Y-%m-%d %T") as updatedAt, created_by, updated_by from alarm_rule where is_deleted = 0 and id = #{id}
select t1.`name` from filter_system t join subsystem t1 on t1.id = t.system_id where t.rule_id = #{id} and t1.is_deleted = 0
select t1.`name` from filter_position t join `position` t1 on t1.id = t.position_id where t.rule_id = #{id} and t1.is_deleted = 0
select t1.`name` from filter_device t join device t1 on t1.id = t.device_id where t.rule_id = #{id} and t1.is_deleted = 0
select t1.`name` from filter_alarm t join alarm_code t1 on t1.id = t.alarm_code_id where t.rule_id = #{id} and t1.is_deleted = 0
